newsitem.title: USA: Princeton Dental sells dental center.
newsitem.headline: Princeton Dental sells dental center.

text.p: Princeton Dental Management Corp on Friday said it sold the assets of Century Dental Center Practice to Valley Forge Dental Associates PC for $585,000.
The sale results in a net gain of $210,000, Princeton said.
The Century Dental Center practice, with 1996 revenues of about $965,000, represented about 5.3 percent of Princeton Dental's total revenue. Century Dental posted a loss in 1996.
The sale price includes $235,000 cash, $140,000 in contingency payments, a $30,000 note receivable and forgiveness of about $180,000 of debt.
